Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Dashboard: Scoped Access
Description:
Scoped access enables managers to view Copilot insights specific to their own organizations both on the Copilot Dashboard and in additional Copilot reports on the Reports page. This allows leaders at different levels to monitor adoption and impact within their teams, while respecting organizational boundaries and privacy. Admins can configure access criteria and set minimum thresholds.
GA date: September CY2025
